text: All moneys derived from assessments for paving and repaving roadways under provisions of existing law shall be paid into the General Fund of the District of Columbia as established by § 47-131.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-2324.

1973 Ed., § 47-1918.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-42, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2301.

DC CODE § 47-2324

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Assessments for street paving--Deposit into General Fund.
